data.title: Launch Expeditionary Learning Charter School
data.meta_description: Learn about our vision to tackle the problems of the future now, starting with a sustainable school campus in Brooklyn.
data.text:
Launch High School on Runway Green

Brooklyn's First K-12 Experiential Learning Ecosystem

In partnership with the National Park Service and a coalition of exceptional non-profit and industry partners, we are building Runway Green, a transformational experiential learning campus, on 1,000 acres of National Park Service land in NYC.

The Launch high school will be part of a seven-acre campus that will also include a 3 acre farm, adventure center, hydroponic greenhouses, ecological lab, solar farm, community hall, recreation area, flexible art plaza, and civic entrance with a public amphitheater.

The high school will offer a personalized, place based, learning experience that is focused on sustainability and career readiness. Students will have the opportunity to work with an ecosystem of exceptional partner organizations to solve real-world problems and earn credentials in the growing green economy.

Our Launch high school will be a model for what equitable education, workforce development, and environmental sustainability can look like in the 21st century.
